titles.title: Come, My Soul, Thy Suit Prepare

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, my soul, thy suit prepare, Jesus loves to answer pray'r. He Himself has bid thee pray, rise and ask without delay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thou art coming to a King, large petitions with thee bring, for his grace and pow'r are such, none can ever ask too much.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With my burden I begin, Lord, remove this load of sin! Let Thy blood, for sinners spilt, set my conscience free from guilt.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lord! I come to Thee for rest, take possession of my breast; there Thy blood-bought right maintain, and without a rival reign.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: While I am a pilgrim here, let Thy love my spirit cheer; as my Guide, my Guard, my Friend, lead me to my journeyâ€™s end.

verse.name: v6
